Hi I'm Czar

Hi, I'm Czar (pronounced 'zar'). I'm a computer programmer based in Tacloban, Philippines. I am experienced in developing web based software using Symfony, Composer, Bower, Angular, and Git. Get in touch with me at 'email at czarpino dot com'.
